title: Sample, September 1947
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: 1/3 straight twill weave and plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 21 x 26 cm (8 1/4 x 10 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: 1/3 straight twill interrupted by one shot of plain weave with paired warps. Warp is white boucle alternating with beige boucle. Wefts have bands of various yellow yarns including two different 2-ply yarns, chenille, and two different shades of boucle. Yellow bands are divided by wefts of shiny black plastic in plain weave with paired warps.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, September 1947.
September 1947. Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: 1/3 straight twill weave and plain weave. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-43.
